scripts.start: concurrently "npx ng build component-library --watch" "npx wait-on dist/component-library/fesm2022/tableau-ui-angular.mjs && ng serve --port 4201" "npm run test-app:watch-icons"
scripts.test-app:watch-icons: npm run test-app:icons:download && npx chokidar "projects/test-app/src/icons.ts" -c "npm run test-app:icons:download"
scripts.build:component-library: ng build component-library && npm run copy-assets
scripts.build:test-app: npm run build:component-library && ng build test-app
scripts.build:github-pages: ng build component-library && npm run test-app:icons:download && ng build test-app --base-href /tableau-ui-angular/
scripts.publish: npx ng-packagr -p projects/component-library/ng-package.json && npm run copy-assets && cd dist/component-library && npm publish
scripts.dev:link: ng build component-library --configuration development && node scripts/link-info.js && ng build component-library --watch --configuration development
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:scss && npm run pretty
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:js:fix && npm run lint:scss:fix && npm run pretty
